title: Kisses!
author: JGray
text:
Presented without comments.

We encourage your comments, however.

replies.author: Sario*Guest*
replies.text: I like the art in this one.

replies.author: fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Does Chrys normally wear her belt under her butt?At first glimpse of that belt and her waistband, it looked as if we were a touch beyond the "first kiss" stage...===============Let me rephrase that: "...a bit beyond and several touches past..."

replies.author: six*Guest*
replies.text: Quite daring to kiss in front of that rainbow fire and smile without checking if they are truly dealt with first. Lovely page and a scene that would make for a great wallpaper.

replies.author: David*Guest*
replies.text:
It is hard to tell which is hotter. Their blossoming romantic relationship, or the living embodiment of Fire (fire elemental?)

:P

replies.author: Blaydewind*Guest*
replies.text:
So, Theresa REALLY goes for short hair.

Good to know.

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text: I would suggest that the void monster, now that it has form of flame, is causing their passion to ignite. That magic bullet also created an aphrodisiac beast.

replies.author: Shorty*Guest*
replies.text: no need comment, just enjoy it ^^

replies.author: Musicalife*Guest*
replies.text: I am just going to do nothing but enjoy this page.
